live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!

38297.summary: Some customers in Willow Park area in Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38297.title: June 8 – Calgary | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
